title: Sports Betting Explosion Is Bringing the Action Here
itunes:title: Sports Betting Explosion Is Bringing the Action Here
description:
Action Network Chief Executive Officer Patrick Keane joins Eben Novy-Williams and Scott Soshnick to discuss a host of issues related to the burgeoning business of sports gambling. Founded in 2017, the Action Network hopes to be the first stop for both serious and casual bettors as they seek to read about the industry, keep track of their wagers and develop new strategies. A former board member at Bleacher Report and 20-year media veteran, Keane said he sees a future where Action Network is a $1 billion company. He discusses the company’s growth strategy, which includes creating content for TV networks, and a potential funding round coming in the near future.

Hosts: Scott Soshnick and Eben Novy-Williams

Producer: Jessica Summers

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
